casebody.data:
Pamela JAMES, Plaintiff
v.
PERDUE FARMS, INC., Employer, Self-Insured (Crawford & Company, Servicing Agent), Defendant. No. 590P03. Supreme Court of North Carolina. February 23, 2004. Daniel F. Read, Durham, for James. Brian M. Freedman, Greensboro, for Perdue Farms, Inc. Prior report: 160 N.CApp. 560 , 586 S.E.2d 557 .

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 12th day of November 2003 by Plaintiff in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 23rd day of February 2004."
